abstract.text: Construct and manage a graphical, event-driven user interface for your macOS app.
Construct and manage a graphical, event-driven user interface for your iOS, iPadOS, or tvOS app.

Harness the power of Quartz technology to perform lightweight 2D rendering with high-fidelity output. Handle path-based drawing, antialiased rendering, gradients, images, color management, PDF documents, and more.
A type of  that you can use for drawing bits to memory.
Generate thumbnails for common file types and add a Thumbnail Extension to your app to enable others to create thumbnails of your custom files.
A request to generate a thumbnail for a custom file type.
The maximum accepted size of a thumbnail.
The minimum accepted size of a thumbnail.
The scale of the requested thumbnail.
The object that provides a thumbnail for a custom file type.
Creates a new thumbnail for a custom file type in the current context.
Creates a new thumbnail for a custom file type in the given context.
Creates a new thumbnail for a custom file type using a file at the given URL.
A structure that contains width and height values.
A value type whose instances are either `true` or `false`.
